name: Interceptor3000
description:
The Interceptor 3000 is a Retrowave-inspired arcade runner powered by Unreal Engine. The gameplay is largely inspired by games such as Retrowave, OutDrive, Neon Drive, but has more emphasis on the flight part and the possibility of active shooting.
After the start of development, it became clear that the final result tends to be similar to Jets'n'guns with a different camera and style.

Demo content

Only one level, one enemy and one Player`s ship. After 10000 points Boss appears.

What next?

More levels, enemy, effects. Customizable  players ship and weapons.
